Sentencas: Suspension direct current plasma spraying allows achieving finely structured coatings whose thickness is between few tens and few hundreds of micrometres.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: Drops (200-300 mu m in diameter) or liquid jets are mechanically injected in the plasma jet.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: With radial injection they are rapidly (a few mu s) fragmented into droplets (a few mu m in diameter).
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: The latter are vaporized (in a few mu s) and the solid particles contained in suspension droplets are accelerated and melted by the plasma jet.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: As in conventional plasma spraying (CPS), much smaller splats (with diameters between 0.2 and 3 mu m and thicknesses between 30 and 200 nm) are arranged in layers up to form the coating.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: The low inertia of particles requires spray distances between 40 and 60 mm which induces plasma heat fluxes up to 22MW m(-2) participating in coating densification.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: Even more than in CPS, the plasma jet fluctuations, particularly for plasmas containing di-atomic gases, perturb drops penetration and fragmentation.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: It has been chosen to illustrate difficulties and possibilities of this new method, through the spraying of the three layers of an element of solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: Indeed, it requires a dense stabilized zirconia electrolyte, if possible thin (15-20 mu s) with two porous electrodes: cathode made of perovskite prone to decomposing upon spraying and anode made of two materials (nickel and zirconia) with very different melting points.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs

Sentencas: These components were obtained by spraying ethanol suspensions, with, first, LaMnO3 perovskite particles doped with 10 mol% of MnO2 and 3 mu m in mean diameter sprayed with pure argon to limit their decomposition and achieve porous coatings, second, Yttria (13 wt%) stabilized zirconia (YSZ) with two different particle size distributions and morphologies for which plasma compositions were adapted, producing in both cases 15 mu m thick and fully dense coatings, third, porous Raneigh nickel by co-spraying the YSZ suspension and solution of nickel nitrate.
Titulo: Suspension and solution plasma spraying of finely structured layers: potential application to SOFCs
